runs.task: Fix service worker stale file references
runs.details: Removed personalized-dashboard.js and event-filter.js from SW cache list (files don't exist). Bumped cache version to v10-cleanup.

Implemented the empty updateFilterCount() method to show a visible count of filtered events (e.g. '12 of 45 events'). Added #filterCount element and CSS to index.html. Count updates on filter toggle and initial load.

runs.task: Add dashboard filter and utility unit tests
runs.details: Extracted pure functions into docs/js/dashboard-helpers.js and added 52 unit tests covering escapeHtml, formatEventTime, getRelativeTime, sportDisplayName, getAbbreviatedTeamName, truncateTitle, passesFilter, and isFavoriteEvent.

Removed 4 dead fallback fetch attempts for non-existent -open.json files (football-open.json, f1-open.json, chess-open.json, esports-open.json) from docs/js/sports-api.js. These caused unnecessary 404 network errors on every page load.

runs.task: Add ARIA accessibility attributes to dashboard
runs.details: Added role=navigation to filter section, aria-pressed to all filter buttons with dynamic JS toggling, aria-label to icon-only buttons, role=list/listitem to events container/cards, and aria-live=polite to dynamically updated regions.

runs.task: Add lazy loading to event card images
runs.details: Added loading=lazy attribute to team logo images (home/away) and golfer headshot images in simple-dashboard.js for improved page load performance.
